column5: Fished the lower river from shore yesterday. Started up in the glen area and the water looked really nice, 7-8 foot of vis. and blueish green. Tried roe bags and all kind of artificials, but couldent get bit. Then I tried some dead baits(3-4 inch shiners) I had left over from ice fishing and hit a couple steelhead and my brother got one on a power minnow.    Nothing for the next hour or so. So we decided to try a different spot. Saw this on the walk back and thought it looked pretty neat.    Down lower in the river there was only 3-4 foot of vis. But we got into a few browns using power minnows.
Nice fish !!!! and great pics too....cheers
Some nice fish and good report! Good  info on visibilty and baits as well.  Thanks for sharing, ehg
Good work, thanks for the pictures...
